title: Practical Ways to Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Organization
description: Rohit Bhargava, founder of the Non-Obvious Company and Ideapress Publishing, also discusses how to host and participate in events that exemplify diversity and inclusion.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
